name: Core Spawn Crawler
languages: understands Deep Speech but can't speak

traits.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The crawler has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the crawler's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The crawler makes four attacks: one with its bite, two with its claws, and one with its tail.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 4 (1d4 + 2 damage) piercing damage and the target must succeed on a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} until the start of the crawler's next turn.

actions.name: Claws
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2 damage) piercing damage.
